description: Manage deployments for Azure Cognitive Services accounts.

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account deployment create
commands.summary: Create a deployment for Azure Cognitive Services account.
commands.syntax:
az cognitiveservices account deployment create --model-format
                                               --model-name
                                               --model-version
                                               --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--capacity]
                                               [--deployment-name]
                                               [--model-source]
                                               [--scale-capacity]
                                               [--scale-settings-scale-type {Manual, Standard}]
                                               [--sku]
examples: az cognitiveservices account deployment create -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-oai --deployment-name dpy --model-name ada --model-version "1" --model-format OpenAI --sku-capacity 1 --sku-name "Standard"

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account deployment delete
commands.summary: Delete a deployment from Azure Cognitive Services account.
examples: az cognitiveservices account deployment delete -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-oai --deployment-name dpy

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account deployment list
commands.summary: Show all deployments for Azure Cognitive Services account.
examples: az cognitiveservices account deployment list -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-oai

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account deployment show
commands.summary: Show a deployment for Azure Cognitive Services account.
examples: az cognitiveservices account deployment show -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-oai --deployment-name dpy
